Homeland Security​ Professional physical access control unit that is easily deployable onto any existing network. Usable in stadiums or airports, this unit will manage the load with no effort at all.​ Professional physical access control unit that is easily deployable onto any existing network. Usable in stadiums or airports, this unit will manage the load with no effort at all.​ Visions-64​ Face recognition Based physical Access control terminal​ VisionA-64™ incorporates precision face recognition technology into an ergonomic computer peripheral that delivers unparalleled performance, reliability and convenience. Available in a modular manner, using the most accurate technology to the biometric market. The VisionA-64™ operates as a Standalone PAC or as part of a networked Access control solution, allowing for complete Modularity and interoperability between all MAD EYE and third party software and hardware using our VA64WS (integration webservice).​ Face recognition Based physical Access control terminal​ VisionA-64™ incorporates precision face recognition technology into an ergonomic computer peripheral that delivers unparalleled performance, reliability and convenience.
